message:update.title: Preliminary Release Date
message:update.content-body:
A preliminary date for the new releases of our distro is June 11, 2018. All releases will contain the spectre-fixed kernels for the baseline.
Updated kernels for the Slackware versions can be downloaded by using the update command of the package manager.
People who subscribe to our distro, will get in addition, the first release of our Gtk2-based desktop, named Carbon2 [C2].
Depending on the amount of donations, further releases of the desktop using different toolkits [FOX, GTK3, QT4, QT5], may be delayed or accelerated.
The Java version is too be a commercial only release, preliminary called Carbon14 [C14].

message:update.title: Portal Announcement
message:update.content-body: Announcing the opening of our Breeze::OS shop, which is attached to our main company portal Glyph.Cloud. You will be able to purchase cd-roms or flash drives, containing the latest releases of our distribution. You will also be able to register to our Breeze::OS subscriptions. Other services will also be offered on the Glyph.Cloud portal.

message:update.title: Portal Announcement
message:update.content-body: Our Breeze::OS Glyph.Cloud shop is still under construction. We are currently setting up a public key creation feature, to secure communications with our prospective clients.

message:update.title: Portal Announcement
message:update.content-body: Announcing that in two weeks; all the work underway to secure our website will be complete. Our Breeze::OS shop will then be put online and ready for business. As previously mentioned, our Breeze::OS shop is attached to our main company portal Glyph.Cloud.

message:update.title: Portal Announcement
message:update.content-body: Update to the previous post: After announcing that in two weeks, all the work underway to secure our website will be complete; a possible sabotage of our website and server setup might have taken place. A few more days will be required to ascertain to how the sabotage migh t have taken place.
